name: Blouncy
description:
Blouncy is a two-button sidescroller with two objectives; don't fall down, and don't hit the spiky balls. The only problem; you can't stop bouncing. See how far you can go!

Featuring advanced game mechanics such as:
- Gravity!
- Damage!
- Player controlled lateral movement!

Use the arrow keys to move back and forth, and get that number up as high as you can!
